  Item 9.01.  Financial Statements and Exhibits  
                                                 
Exhibits are filed herewith in connection with the Registration Statement on 
Form S-3(File No. 333-269514)filed by Wells Fargo & Company (the “Company”)  
with the Securities and Exchange Commission (the “SEC”). On April 23, 2024,  
the Company issued CAD1,250,000,000 5.083% Fixed-to-FloatingRate Notes Due   
April 26, 2028 (the “Notes”). The purpose of this Current Report is to file  
with the SEC the following documents: (i) the Underwriting Agreement for the 
Notes; (ii) the form of the Notes; and (iii) the opinion of Faegre Drinker   
Biddle & Reath LLP regarding the Notes.                                      
                 
  (d)  Exhibits
